perfect peace. The literal reading is peace, peace. Those of the strong city will have perfect peace if their mind rests on Jehovah and if they trust in him. Isaiah calls the Lord the Prince of Peace (9:6).

whose mind [rests] on thee. In our day the Lord has said, "Look unto me in every thought" (D&C 6:36). Those whose thoughts are upon the Lord continually are blessed with perfect peace.
